message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to both you and myself. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I would like to propose a fair deal. Would you be interested in acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $7,200? This offer includes an exclusive 10% discount, making it a great opportunity for you to experience the value this product offers. Looking forward to your positive response.
